name: Egggs
description:
We made this game for Ludum Dare 34.
Please leave a rating/comment on the Ludum Dare site!

You are a chicken, and your life goal is to hatch an egg.
Keep at it and dream big, you fabulous bird!
I wonder what's inside the egg though?

CREDITS
Peter Sperl - Graphics, Music, Sound effects
Thomas Unger - Background graphics
Georg Sperl - Programming, Graphics
Simon Parzer - Programming

Source code available on Github!
https://github.com/oncer/ld34
